languages.text: "Я происхожу из благородного рода Зауэрбэк, что обитает на столичном мире Даргонус. Смею отметить, что наш дом знаменит преданностью и строгостью в следовании законам, поэтому члены моей семьи испокон веков становятся вашими верными блюстителями. Мне выпала честь быть шестым Мастером дисциплины, носящим имя Зауэрбэк и служащим на этом корабле". {n}Иокаста произносит это с нескрываемой гордостью.{/n}

"I come from the noble Sauerback family of the capital world of Dargonus. I dare say that our house is renowned for its loyalty and strict adherence to the law, and the members of my family have been your faithful enforcers for centuries. I am honoured to be the sixth Master-at-Arms named Sauerback to serve on this ship." {n}Jocasta speaks the words with unmistakable pride.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я происхожу из благородного рода Зауэрбэк, что обитает на столичном мире Даргонус. Мне выпала честь быть шестым Мастером дисциплины, носящим имя Зауэрбэк и служащим на этом корабле". {n}Иокаста произносит это с нескрываемой гордостью.{/n}

I dare say that our house is renowned for its loyalty and strict adherence to the law, so the members of my family have been your faithful enforcers for centuries. I am honoured to be the sixth Master-at-Arms named Sauerback to serve on this ship". {n}Jocasta says it with unmistakable pride.{/n}

languages.text: « Le sang des Sauerback, famille noble du monde-capitale Dargonus, coule dans mes veines. J'affirme que notre maison est connue pour son indéfectible loyauté et son respect strict de la loi. Voilà des siècles que les membres de ma famille servent votre dynastie en qualité de prévôts, et j'ai moi-même l'insigne honneur d'être le sixième capitaine d'armes Sauerback à servir sur ce vaisseau, » {n}proclame Jocasta en rayonnant de fierté.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I come from the noble Sauerback family of the capital world of Dargonus. I dare say that our house is renowned for its loyalty and strict adherence to the law, and the members of my family have been your faithful enforcers for centuries. I am honoured to be the sixth Master-at-Arms named Sauerback to serve on this ship." {n}Jocasta speaks the words with unmistakable pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Le sang des Sauerback, famille noble du monde-capitale Dargonus, coule dans mes veines. J'affirme que notre maison est connue pour son indéfectible loyauté et son respect strict de la loi. Voilà des siècles que les membres de ma famille servent votre dynastie en qualité de prévôts, et j'ai moi-même l'insigne honneur d'être le sixième capitaine d'armes Sauerback à servir sur ce vaisseau, » {n}proclame Jocasta en rayonnant de fierté.{/n}

languages.text: «Provengo de la noble familia Sauerback del mundo capital de Dargonus. Me atrevería a decir que nuestra casa es conocida por su lealtad y adherencia estricta a la ley, y los miembros de mi familia han velado por su seguridad fielmente durante siglos. Es un honor para mí ser la sexta maestra de armas con el apellido Sauerback que sirve en esta nave». {n}Jocasta pronuncia estas palabras con orgullo evidente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I come from the noble Sauerback family of the capital world of Dargonus. I dare say that our house is renowned for its loyalty and strict adherence to the law, and the members of my family have been your faithful enforcers for centuries. I am honoured to be the sixth Master-at-Arms named Sauerback to serve on this ship." {n}Jocasta speaks the words with unmistakable pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Provengo de la noble familia Sauerback del mundo capital de Dargonus. Me atrevería a decir que nuestra casa es conocida por su lealtad y adherencia estricta a la ley, y los miembros de mi familia han velado por su seguridad fielmente durante siglos. Es un honor para mí ser la sexta maestra de armas con el apellido Sauerback que sirve en esta nave». {n}Jocasta pronuncia estas palabras con orgullo evidente.{/n}

languages.text: “我是苏尔贝克家族的成员，来自首都世界达戈努斯。可以这么说，我们的家族成员对主人绝无二心。我们严格遵守法律，也因此名闻遐迩。这几百年来，我们家族的成员一直都是冯·瓦兰修斯家族忠诚的执法者，而我也很荣幸能成为这艘船上第六位来自苏尔贝克家族的戒律大师。”{n}约卡斯塔说出这些话的时候，带着明显的自豪。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I come from the noble Sauerback family of the capital world of Dargonus. I dare say that our house is renowned for its loyalty and strict adherence to the law, and the members of my family have been your faithful enforcers for centuries. I am honoured to be the sixth Master-at-Arms named Sauerback to serve on this ship." {n}Jocasta speaks the words with unmistakable pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我是苏尔贝克家族的成员，来自首都世界达戈努斯。可以这么说，我们的家族成员对主人绝无二心。我们严格遵守法律，也因此名闻遐迩。这几百年来，我们家族的成员一直都是冯·瓦兰修斯家族忠诚的执法者，而我也很荣幸能成为这艘船上第六位来自苏尔贝克家族的戒律大师。”{n}约卡斯塔说出这些话的时候，带着明显的自豪。{/n}

languages.text: 「私は首都惑星ダルゴナスの高貴なザウアーバック家の出身です。我が家族はその忠誠心と法の厳守で有名で、我が一族は何世紀にもわたってあなた様の忠実な執行人でありました。 私はザウアーバック家6人目のマスター・アット・アームスとしてこの船に仕えることを、光栄に思います」{n}ジョカスタは誇り高く喋った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I come from the noble Sauerback family of the capital world of Dargonus. I dare say that our house is renowned for its loyalty and strict adherence to the law, and the members of my family have been your faithful enforcers for centuries. I am honoured to be the sixth Master-at-Arms named Sauerback to serve on this ship." {n}Jocasta speaks the words with unmistakable pride.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私は首都惑星ダルゴナスの高貴なザウアーバック家の出身です。我が家族はその忠誠心と法の厳守で有名で、我が一族は何世紀にもわたってあなた様の忠実な執行人でありました。 私はザウアーバック家6人目のマスター・アット・アームスとしてこの船に仕えることを、光栄に思います」{n}ジョカスタは誇り高く喋った。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich stamme aus dem Adelsgeschlecht der Sauerbacks von der Hauptwelt Dargonus. In aller Bescheidenheit darf ich berichten, dass unser Haus für seine Loyalität und strikte Gesetzestreue bekannt ist. Die Mitglieder meiner Familie dienen seit Jahrhunderten als treue Enforcers. Es ist meine große Ehre, als sechster Master-at-Arms namens Sauerback auf diesem Schiff zu dienen." {n}Unverkennbarer Stolz liegt in Jocastas Worten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I come from the noble Sauerback family of the capital world of Dargonus. I dare say that our house is renowned for its loyalty and strict adherence to the law, and the members of my family have been your faithful enforcers for centuries. I am honoured to be the sixth Master-at-Arms named Sauerback to serve on this ship." {n}Jocasta speaks the words with unmistakable pride.{/n}

In aller Bescheidenheit darf ich berichten, dass unser Haus für seine Loyalität und strikte Gesetzestreue bekannt ist. Die Mitglieder meiner Familie dienen seit Jahrhunderten als treue Enforcers. Es ist meine große Ehre, als sechster Master-at-Arms namens Sauerback auf diesem Schiff zu dienen." {n}Unverkennbarer Stolz liegt in Jocastas Worten.{/n}

languages.text: "Dargonus başdünyasının soylu Sauerback ailesindenim. Hanemizin sadakatiyle ve kanunlara sıkı sıkıya bağlı oluşuyla tanındığını gururla söyleyebilirim ve ailemiz mensupları, yüzyıllardır sadık infazcılarınız olmuştur. Bu gemide Silahtar olarak hizmet eden Sauerback ismindeki altıncı kişi olmaktan onur duyuyorum." {n}Jocasta, bu sözleri katıksız bir gururla sarf ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I come from the noble Sauerback family of the capital world of Dargonus. I dare say that our house is renowned for its loyalty and strict adherence to the law, and the members of my family have been your faithful enforcers for centuries. I am honoured to be the sixth Master-at-Arms named Sauerback to serve on this ship." {n}Jocasta speaks the words with unmistakable pride.{/n}
